creator: PH Education
descriptionHtml:
PH Education has created an amazing application for learning Russian vocabulary. The offline vocabulary will enhance your enthusiasm and interest in learning Russian vocabulary step by step. Russian is a beautiful and the most popular language that everyone wants to learn. Starting from the alphabet one also needs to learn and memorize the words from the vocabulary according to every situation. Therefore PH Education has developed this application for learning Russian vocabulary according to different places and situations. Let us discuss the wonderful features and advantages that this application has.

ABOUT THE LEARN RUSSIAN VOCABULARY :~

The Learn Russian Vocabulary is structured for beginners as well as advanced learners who are very keen and interested in learning Russian. Vocabulary plays an important role in learning any language in the world. One can acquire a language perfectly if and only if the most important and specific words are learned.

In the learn Russian vocabulary application the developers have categorized sections for learning specific words from the vocabulary. Every language has its essence and importance in this world. Some people are there who don't bound themselves in one or two certain languages. The learning vocabulary series from PH Education will allow the people who want to self-learn without wasting time on expensive language courses.

Traveling or working in other countries is fun if and only if you have any knowledge about the language there, otherwise problems there will be never-ending. The Learn Russian Vocabulary application can be an opportunity for this kind of person. One can learn any language they want using the learned language vocabulary even offline. Don't pressurize the mind in workload and language courses, just use the application and learn whenever one has free time!!

FEATURES OF THE LEARN RUSSIAN VOCABULARY :~

DIFFERENT SEGMENTS :~

For the advantage of learning the language, the developers have created 27 segments in total according to different situations and places. The segments include words regarding social life, educational life, traveling experience, games, animals, vehicles, sports, adventure, nature, profession, time, etc.

VOCABULARY SECTION :~

The major section is the vocabulary section from where one can find or search words alphabetically. The application has every single word and translates the meaning with precision. One can learn from the vocabulary section as well as from the different segments explained above.

FAVORITE LIST :~

An extra but useful feature from the learn Russian vocabulary application is the favorite list section. A red heart indicates the favorite section. If anyone uses a word frequently or can't memorize a word too often then the list can be very useful for them. Whenever one finds an important word just tap on the blank heart beside and get the word on the list.

OFFLINE :~

The Learn Russian Vocabulary is an offline application so one can also use it whenever they are offline. There will be no issue using the application without any internet connection. Just have the phone and learn the vocabulary without any disturbance. No more worries about slow or interrupted internet connection.

The users are advised to contact the developer for any kind of query, suggestion, or complaint.
descriptionShort: Learn The Russian vocabulary from 48 languages Offline.
title: Learn Russian vocabulary
